Good mangas you've read

4
Sabotage
Wednesday, August 23rd, 2017, 1:57:11 AM

Can't recommend this enough. It is NSFW and has very adult themes (I wouldn't let a 13 year old read this). The artwork is just stunning and the story is very good. This isn't a Bleach/Naruto manga. Each panel is created with amazing intricacy. Go read it now and share my obsession.

http://readberserk.com/

eric
Wednesday, August 23rd, 2017, 7:29:48 PM

I seen the Yu-gi-oh! TV show and one time read a good piece of the manga. It was a lot darker than I expected. I didn't see one walk-e-talk-e!

Yu-Gi-Oh the abridged series is hilarious.

mark
Friday, August 25th, 2017, 12:49:07 PM

Hajime no Ippo (though I haven't kept up with it for the past couple years) if you think boxing is neat.

Jojo's Bizarre Adventure. Araki's got a unique style, probably my favorite serial-manga artist. Series 2 and 4 are my favorites (Battle Tendency and Diamond is Unbreakable).

My geekiness has been more western-oriented lately, so I'll also mention Chew. It's a must-read if you can stomach (heh) the subject matter.
